div.head: 五絕急病
div.div: the five cut-offs with acute disease

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the five cut-offs with acute disease

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wu jue si 五絕死 , the five cut-offs with [an appearance of] death. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry ban xia 半夏 quotes Zi mu mi lu 子母秘錄 : 治五絕：一曰自縊 , 二曰 牆壁壓 , 三曰溺水 , 四曰魘魅 , 五曰產乳 , “To cure the five cut-offs: First, [appearance of death following] suicide by hanging; second, [appearance of death following] being crushed by a wall; third, [appearance of death because of] drowning; fourth, [appearance of death because of] nightmare seduction-specters; fifth, [appearance of death in the course of] birth. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ban xia 半 夏 quotes Zi mu mi lu 子母秘錄 from Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 : 五絕急病：一曰自縊 , 二曰牆壓 , 三曰溺水 , 四曰魘魅 , 五曰產乳 , “ The five cut-offs with acute disease : first, [appearance of death following] suicide by hanging; second, [appearance of death following] being crushed by a wall; third, [appearance of death because of] drowning; fourth, [appearance of death because of] nightmare seduction-specters; fifth, [appearance of death in the course of giving] birth.
